name: Robotz In War Primitive: The Zequel (Early Access)
name_original: Robotz In War Primitive: The Zequel (Early Access)
description:
After the events of Robotz In War, they make a time machine to escape the War and find it to be a primitive nightmare. So they leave, but, oh no: the time machine broke, You must go through: Forest; Caves; Taverns; and journey the highlands and meet the gods of the world to save your early civilization.

Please donate to the original game so we can make the game better, If you do, you get behind-the-scenes action with an exciting look at the characters, as well as yourself being in the game. The smallest amount helps.

Original Robotz In War:

Defeat the robots so they don't rule with an iron fist... Literally

Add Game To Collection
